dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3913122Z] DMCA Notice and Takedown Letter

-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 02, 2007 11:38 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3913122Z] DMCA Notice and Takedown Letter ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA Notice and Takedown Letter Added by system at Wednesday, May 2 2007 04:37 pm X-MailFrom: legal@wiscocomputing.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed May 2 16:36:54 2007 Received: (qmail 27187 invoked by alias); 2 May 2007 21:36:54 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 27184 invoked from network); 2 May 2007 21:36:54 -0000 Received: from smtp01.theplanet.com (70.87.6.110) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 May 2007 21:36:54 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp01.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Wed, 2 May 2007 16:36:53 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Wed, 02 May 2007 16:36:53 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from legal@wiscocomputing.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HjMVI-0004k0-Nc for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 02 May 2007 16:36:52 -0500 Received: from mtao04.charter.net ([209.225.8.178]) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from legal@wiscocomputing.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HjMVE-0008DZ-9a for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 02 May 2007 16:36:48 -0500 Received: from aa06.charter.net ([10.20.200.158]) by mtao04.charter.net (InterMail vM.7.08.02.00 201-2186-121-20061213) with ESMTP id <20070502213646.FZFI1527.mtao04.charter.net@aa06.charter.net>; Wed, 2 May 2007 17:36:46 -0400 Received: from cambrian17 ([24.179.155.57]) by aa06.charter.net with ESMTP id <20070502213646.OGO6497.aa06.charter.net@cambrian17>; Wed, 2 May 2007 17:36:46 -0400 Reply-To: From: "Terry Jepson" To: Cc: , Subject: DMCA Notice and Takedown Letter Date: Wed, 2 May 2007 16:36:43 -0500 Message-ID: <000501c78d01$fd1a9550$0301a8c0@cambrian17> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0006_01C78CD8.14448D50" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 Thread-Index: AceNAfokQCqY5WrVRkSXVrzUVhHicA== X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 X-Chzlrs: 0 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 May 2007 21:36:53.0144 (UTC) FILETIME=[FFEB4180:01C78D01] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 US +1-214-782-7802 Date: May 2, 2007 NOTICE AND PROCEDURE FOR MAKING CLAIMS OF COPYRIGHT OR INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY INFRINGEMENT This is a Notice of Copyright Infringement of a web site hosted by ThePlanet.com. I am using my legal rights to have my intellectual property removed from the www.creditcardstation.net web site as stated in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (DMCA). 1. I am the copyright owner. My Signature: Terry Jepson 2. Description of the copyrighted work claimed to be infringed. My article 'Merchant Credit Card Fraud' was originally published in September 2001 by The Association of Shareware Professionals (ASP) for their members. This can be verified by contacting the editor or executive director of the ASP at www.asp-shareware.org. The original article was published on the web in October 2001. The article was expanded and published again in July 2004, and August 2004. Shortly after that, the expanded current article was published on my web site at http://www.wiscocomputing.com/articles/ccfraud.htm. 3. Description of infringing material. The web site page at http://www.creditcardstation.net/articles/31-Ways-to-Minimize-Credit-Car d-Fr aud contains my copyrighted article. I never gave the web site, or any person connected with this web site permission to place my copyrighted article on that web site. That web site has also removed my copyright notice from my article. My article is not and has never been in the public domain. 4. My contact Information Terry Jepson WISCO Computing P. O. Box 8 Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495 legal@wiscocomputing.com 5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Thank you for your cooperation with this matter. My Signature: Terry Jepson Date: May 2, 2007 MIME element (text/html)

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. abuse@theplanet.com< /p>

1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110

Dallas, TX  75207

US

+1-214-782-7802

 

Date: May 2, 2007

 

NOTICE AND PROCEDURE FOR MAKING CLAIMS OF COPYRIGHT OR INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY INFRINGEMENT

This is a Notice of Copyright Infringement of a web site hosted by ThePlanet.com. I am using my legal rights to have my intellectual property removed from the www.creditcardstation.net web site as stated in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 (DMCA).

 

1. I am the copyright owner. My Signature: Terry Jepson

 

2. Description of the copyrighted work claimed to be infringed.

My article 'Merchant Credit Card Fraud' was originally published in September 2001 by The Association of Shareware Professionals (ASP) for their members. This can be verified by contacting the editor or executive director of the ASP at www.asp-shareware.org. The original article was published on the web in October 2001. The article was expanded and published again in July 2004, and August 2004. Shortly after that, the expanded current article was published on my web site at http://www.wiscocomputing.com/articles/ccfraud.htm.

 

3. Description of infringing material.

The web site page at http://www.creditcardstation.net/articles/31-Ways-to-Minimize-Credit-Car d-Fraud contains my copyrighted article. I never gave the web site, or any person connected with this web site permission to place my copyrighted article on that web site. That web site has also removed my copyright notice from my article. My article is not and has never been in the public domain.

 

4. My contact Information

Terry Jepson

WISCO Computing

P. O. Box 8

Wisconsin Rapids, WI 54495

legal@wiscocomputing.com

 

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

 

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

 

Thank you for your cooperation with this matter.

 

My Signature: Terry Jepson

        Date: May 2, 2007

MIME element (text/plain)
